questions.question: For which material the failure load is least?
In shear test conducted for mild steel rod( M.S.R), mild steel plate( M.S.P) and timber( T), which is the correct order of shear strength obtained

answers.a: M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear > Timber in single shear
answers.b: Timber in single shear > M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear
answers.c: M.S.P in double shear > M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear
answers.d: M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear > M.S.P in double shear

questions.question: Rate of loading for determination of shear strength parallel to the grain is
The shear stress at any section of a shaft is maximum
